__framelix_browser_unsupported__: Your browser is not supported anymore. Please update to a current version of Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Safari or any other brand.
__framelix_create_or_edit_before_proceed: Please create or select an entry to proceed editing this data section.

Are you sure to delete this entry?
This action cannot be undone!
__framelix_error_access_denied__: Sorry. Your are not allowed to view this page.
__framelix_error_invalid_url__: The requested page is missing some required parameters
__framelix_form_2fa_backup_code_used__: You have used a one time backup code for your 2-factor authentication. This code cannot be used anymore.
__framelix_form_2fa_usebackup__: Or click here to use one of your backup codes
__framelix_form_file_delete_existing__:
Delete file from database
You must store this form to delete the file
__framelix_form_file_pick__: Pick a file, or drag & drop a file in here
__framelix_form_validation_captcha_inval: Couldn't verify captcha, please try again
__framelix_form_validation_captcha_verif: Your device has been successfully verified
__framelix_form_validation_email__: This need to be a correct e-mail address
__framelix_form_validation_invaliddate__: This is not a valid date
__framelix_form_validation_maxdate__: The date cannot be greater than {date}
__framelix_form_validation_maxlength__: The text cannot be longer than {{number=1:{number} character|number=*:{number} characters}}
__framelix_form_validation_maxselectedfi: A maximum of {{number=1:{number} file|number=*:{number} files}} can be selected
__framelix_form_validation_maxselectedit: A maximum of {{number=1:{number} option|number=*:{number} options}} can be selected
__framelix_form_validation_maxtime__: The time cannot be greater than {time}
__framelix_form_validation_mindate__: The date cannot be less than {date}
__framelix_form_validation_minlength__: The text cannot be less than {{number=1:{number} character|number=*:{number} characters}} long
__framelix_form_validation_minselectedfi: At least {{number=1:{number} file|number=*:{number} files}} must be selected
__framelix_form_validation_minselectedit: At least {{number=1:{number} option|number=*:{number} options}} must be selected
__framelix_form_validation_mintime__: The time cannot be less than {time}
__framelix_form_validation_required__: This field needs to be filled out
__framelix_form_validation_twofactor__: The entered code is not valid
__framelix_login_invalid_fido2__: E-Mail does not exist, not have enabled a Passkey or your device has not enabled a Passkey for this e-mail
__framelix_login_invalid_user__: E-Mail and/or password does not match
__framelix_modified_timestamp_updated__: This entry has been modified after it has been created
__framelix_password_notcorrect__: Your current password is not correct
__framelix_password_verify__: Please enter your password for this secured area
__framelix_quick_search_help__:
Use * or empty search value to search everything
Use ** to search everything and start on next pageload automatically
Use >50, >=50, =50, !=50, <50, <=50 to search values greather/equal/lower then 50
Use ~hello to search values containing hello (Which is the default even without ~)
Use !~hello to search values not containing hello
Use "hello friend" to search for the full sentence "hello friend"
Use hello && bye to find entries which contain both words (Default is either or)
Use settings icon to search only in specific fields
__framelix_quick_search_placeholder__: Type here and press enter to search. Use * or empty value to find all.
__framelix_quick_search_settings__: Extended settings - Choose specific fields to search in
__framelix_reset_alerts_done__: All infotexts are now visible again
__framelix_setup_done__: Setup finished successfully. You can now login with your credentials.
__framelix_setup_finish_description__:
Ok. Now it's about time to let some magic happen and let the system self setup from now.
This may take several moments.
If you are ready, hit the button!
__framelix_setup_mysql_database_desc__: The set up try to create the database if not exist. This requires proper permissions for the database user. If you use our default composer file, the database does already exist.
__framelix_setup_mysql_host_desc__: If you run MariaDB container with our default compose file (mariadb service in docker-compose.yml), you must provide the service name here.
__framelix_setup_step_security_desc__: This account will be created with the administrator role.
__framelix_simulateuser__:
Simulate this user
You basically interact in the same way as this user can
You see/not see everything that this user see
Database actions still log your original user in create and update information
__framelix_simulateuser_info__: You are viewing this page as simulated user {0}
__framelix_stop_edit_tooltip__: Will revert all unsaved data and redirect you to create a new entry
__framelix_systemvalues_active_form_labe:
Active entries can be selected in edit forms.
Inactive entries will not be selectable anymore.
__framelix_table_savesort_tooltip__: You have changed the sorting and you can save this sort in the database. Scroll down to the bottom to save it.
__framelix_toast_count__: Number of messages in the queue
__framelix_user_edituser_validation_admi: There is always at least one, non locked, administrator account that must exist.
__framelix_user_flag_locked_desc__: If activated, the user is instantly locked and cannot login anymore.
__framelix_view_backend_dev_langeditor_s: Update, normalize and resort all language files and keys
Do this after you have manually edited a file. It will properly update the contents and resort the keys so you don't have to.
__framelix_view_backend_dev_updatedataba: Schema hash has changed. Please reload the page and try again.
There are no database changes pending. Good work, master.
Safe queries to only create new columns/tables

Unsafe queries which modify/delete existing columns
Attention: Only execute the queries when you are sure your data don't get lost. Always make a backup before this action.
__framelix_view_backend_forgotpassword_m:
You have requested a password reset of your account at {0}.
Please open the following link to reset your password
__framelix_view_backend_forgotpassword_r: You have set your new password. You can now login with this new password.
__framelix_view_backend_forgotpassword_s: If the email '{0}' exist, we have sent you a verification email. This mail must be opened within the next hour.
__framelix_view_backend_forgotpassword_t: The verification token is invalid. Please try again.
__framelix_view_backend_userprofile_2fa_: If you want to link a new second factor device, you have to disable 2FA and then link both devices at the same time, with the same QR code code.
Are you sure? This will now deactivate and invalidate all your 2-factor features!

After you have scanned the QR Code, enter the 6-digits code from the app bellow. If you have entered the correct code, the window will close automatically and from now on you have the second factor enabled.

You can now scan this QR code with your authenticator app. We recommend Google Authenticator, andOTP or Twilio.
Also download and save your backup codes, in case your authenticator app get lost.
Choose a name for your authenticator app

With 2-Factor Authentication you can enable a more secure login progress, which then require a second factor (TOTP - One Time Password) every time you login. Once enabled, you should have your backup codes stored in a secure place, in case your second factor device get's lost. Otherwise, when you loose your second factor and when you loose your backup codes, you cannot login anymore.
Create and download new backup codes
Are you sure? This will disable all previous backup codes!
__framelix_view_backend_userprofile_emai: This e-mail is the same as you already have
On this page you can change your e-mail. You will get an e-mail on your old and your new address, which both contains a verification link that you must open.

You have requested a email change of your account at {0}.
Please open the following link to verify the e-mail change
We have sent an e-mail to both addresses. Please open the verification link from both e-mails to verify your account.
Error. Verification link is invalid. You must open the link within 1 hour after the change request.
Step 1 done. Please open the second verification link from the other e-mail address. You can close this window now.
Step 2 done. your new e-mail address is now {0}. You can close this window now.
__framelix_view_backend_userprofile_fido: If you login with a Passkey, you not need a second factor, even if 2-Factor Authentication is enabled. A Passkey is already considered really secure and is device bound, which effectively is the second factor.
You have already enabled a Passkey for this device
Missing correct WebAuthnId. Please repeat the process.
Disable the Passkey on this device
Passkey doesn't work on {domain}. Use {use} for example to fix that issue.
Enable a Passkey on this device now

With a Passkey you can enable secure web logins like Fingerprint Login, Hardware Token Login, etc... on this device. After you have activated this feature, you can still login with your password but you can also login with your second secure login method. You can delete each added Passkey, which disable the advanced login functionality for this device.
Authentication successfully added. You can now login with this authentication method.
Sorry. Passkeys are not supported on this device/browser.
__framelix_view_loading__: This view is loading... Please wait...
